welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sfax, Tunisia! Get ready to immerse yourself in the rich history and vibrant culture of this charming city known for its beautiful medina, bustling souks, and delicious seafood. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Sfax has to offer.

restaurants.name: Saffoud Abid (سفود عبيد)
restaurants.description: Saffoud Abid (سفود عبيد) is a steakhouse located in صفاقس.

restaurants.name: Restaurant Le Corail
restaurants.description: Restaurant Le Corail is a seafood restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Baguette & Baguette Sfax
restaurants.description: Baguette & Baguette Sfax is a fast food restaurant located in صفاقس.

restaurants.name: guink'o
restaurants.description: guink'o is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Sandwich BOB +
restaurants.description: Sandwich BOB + is a sandwich spot located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sfax Thyna Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for free. Network name and password can be obtained at the information desk.
